page.shortlink: tabbed ui properties other date format property
page.description: Specify the format that the user must use for entering date values. (Applies in the case of Reports that prompt for date or time argument values.) In V11 and above an optional time format can also be specified. The time portion of the format string is separated from the date portion by '&&'.\
page.tip: You can specify the date format dynamically by setting the format using this session variable: __protected__clientSideDateFormat
